scripts.build: wasm-pack build --release --no-typescript --target no-modules; npm run-script link-web
scripts.build-debug: wasm-pack build --debug --no-typescript --target no-modules; npm run-script link-web
scripts.link-web: cp pkg/privateid.js web/util/wasm_bindgen.js; cp pkg/privateid_bg.wasm web/bin/privateid.wasm
